English.Text: You emerge right on top of them! Swinging masterfully through the stone jaws that gate the inlet, your navigators traverse a fantasy lagoon. Bursting beyond it to the bay, their ambush is received with complete surprise. With the freedom of the Pyrphorian ship, your crew find an ingenious-looking machine, but no sign of the Prosperity contract. Nevertheless, you are certain it must therefore have changed hands in nearby Montoya, and make a beeline for the port.
